kwargs.dialogs:
2014.06.01
今天可以算是計畫啟動的第一天，整個計畫取名為Adventure，希望這個計劃能夠順利進行。

2014.07.08
找人很多研究人員，但能力參差不齊，來找個時間幫大家上一下演算法的課。

2014.08.01
一直沒為這部機器取個好名子，既然是開始那就叫Alpha好了。

2014.08.07
沒想英國竟然也有類似的計畫，只不過他們研發的是圍棋，而且使用的演算法也不一樣，但沒想到名子竟然和他們差不多，看來工程師取名的邏輯都一樣!

2015.01.17
目前計畫有點卡關，還無法更加模擬人類的思考邏輯，只能按照我們說個規則去執行...

2015.09.19
近期透過非法的手段取得了的腦神經細胞

2017.02.08
目前Alpha的演算法已經初步建好了

2017.05.23
投資方竟然說當初投資錯標的，要中斷資金...
這個計畫看來沒有辦法繼續了......

2014.06.01
Today can be considered the first day of the project launch, the whole project named Adventure, I hope this project can be carried out smoothly.
2014.07.08
I'm looking for a lot of researchers with varying abilities, so I'm looking for a time to help you take a class on algorithms.
2014.08.01
I have not been able to find a good name for this machine, but since it is the beginning, I will call it Alpha.
2014.08.07
I didn't think there was a similar project in the UK, only they are developing Go and using a different algorithm, but I didn't expect the name to be similar to theirs, so it seems that engineers have the same logic in naming things!

2015.01.17
At the moment the project is a bit stuck, it can't simulate the logic of human thinking more, it can only follow the rules we say...
2015.09.19
Recently obtained brain nerve cells through illegal means.

2017.02.08
The Alpha algorithm has been initially built!
2017.05.23
The investor even said that the initial investment in the wrong subject, to interrupt the funding ...
This project seems to be no way to continue ......
